title: Are you a part time member of staff in the North West of England?

content.text: The programme lasts for 8 weeks and will cover subjects like communication skills, personal statements, success profiles, interview skills, mock interviews and much more. Time commitment will be a maximum of 2 hours a week.

It also encourages staff to look at opportunities both inside and outside of their own departments by introducing networking and giving them the skills and knowledge that will assist them in a successful career development.
